channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: The first major pre-poll survey claimed that Vice President
item.description: The first major pre-poll survey claimed that Vice President Kamala Harris was up four points over former President Donald Trump after the Democratic National Convention. The survey by Morning Consult found that 48% of its responders said that they would vote for Harris in the upcoming polls compared to 44% who said they would vote for Trump. Watch. #KamalaHarris #DonaldTrump #TNOriginals #TimesNowOriginals

item.title: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy Promoting social medi
item.description: Row over U.P's New Social Media Policy Promoting social media through legitimate means is, in my opinion, unobjectionable: BJP's Dr. Kaushal K.Mishra This should be illegal; it's our taxpayers' money. Over the past 10 years, the BJP government has spent 8,000 crores of our money on government ads: A Ranganathan #TheNewshourAGENDA | @Madhavdas
